zoe_desc: I worked on kiosk and played Harley Quinn in the video.

julian_fact: I am incredibly extroverted and im always looking for a conversation. I also will probably be the most musically enthusiastic person you'll meet.
brody_desc: I contributed in making the Batman statue as well as helped with the video.

bella_desc: I am the co-captain of the kiosk team, and I worked on the walls this year.
bella_fact: A little procrastination is key to creating an amazing kiosk.
chase_desc: I am a jack of all trades. I do a little bit of everything!
zachdeluc_fact: I've brought peace, freedom, justice and security to my new empire !
marcus_desc: I helped sketch the kiosk, helped cut wood for the car and helped assemble the chains for the robot.
charlie_desc: I acted in the video by being Batman and assisted in the construction of the robot.
mia_desc: I helped with the kiosk by building a Batman themed pinball machine as well as helped with the video.
naman_desc: I worked on the kiosk with other secondary 1's and 2's.
naman_fact: I'm way more productive when I'm supposed to be doing something else.
zachvam_desc: I worked on the front of the Batmobile.
zachvam_fact: I like to watch The Big Bang Theory!
william_desc: Worked on the Batman themed kiosk.
george_desc: I was part of the programming class.
george_fact: AI has nothing on me when it comes to coding.
dany_desc: I worked in the kiosk and the Batmobile, also did electrical circuitry.
dany_fact: I like eating cause it's fun.
christian_desc: I'm going to be in the programming competition!
christian_fact: I'm double jointed on my thumbs so I can't use scissors.
raphael_desc: Cut wood, built the batman car and stuck the LED lights on the front of the car.
jonah_desc: Worked on kiosk (Batman statue) and helped with video.
jonah_fact: Batman doesn't need a GPS - he always takes the Dark Knight route ðŸ¦‡ðŸ˜„ - ChatGPT 2026
box_desc: I worked on the kiosk by managing the wood.
mack_desc: I helped the kiosk team with the building (here and there).
mack_fact: I CANNOT do the irish jig.
nicolas_desc: I acted as the Joker in the video and I helped with the tutorial.
nicolas_fact: I happily painted my hair green as well as did whiteface.
scoring: Score the most points by handling and placing the following engine components that will be on the playing field: fans, cores, and turbines. These components are placed into engines.
rule2: Blue team vs yellow team: 2 robots on each team. 5 minutes per heat.
rule3: Each engine component can come in blue, yellow, or red. Each team uses the parts specific to their team color.
rule4: 6 engines, each can be completed with one fan, one core, one turbine.
rule5: Robots can only carry one component at a time. Cannot carry the other team's color: only their team's color and the red ones.
rule7: If the component that falls out of an engine is a red part, it can be repaired in the repair station. Each team has three repair stations that can turn red parts into repaired parts of their color.
rule8: Spare parts lying around can be brought to the spare parts zone. Each team has one.
rule10: 1 of your color component gives 50 points, 2 give 100 points and 3 give 250 points.
rule12: Tallest stack of the two teams in their spare parts zone brings a 60% multiplier.
rule13: Team with most pieces in their spare parts zone earns a 40% multiplier
rule14: One team can get both bonuses.
rule16: Each component in the spare parts zone is worth 40 points.
